title: Add verification tests for pre-commit hooks
description: Add tests that verify the pre-commit hook system itself works correctly. This ensures tests run on commit and block bad commits.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add test_precommit_blocks_on_failure() - exit code propagates correctly
Add test_no_verify_bypass_works() - --no-verify still available for emergencies
Add meta-test: run test suite, introduce failure, verify commit blocked
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
